description: gallery installation including plates, wreaths, tree frog stands, brocade curtains, specimen jars, rugs, a bench, 2 chairs, a sideboard, 2 tables, 3 shelves, a tablecloth, a fish bowl, 2 snails, sushi snake head drawings, plastic garbage cans, a mixed media wall installation, 5 pillows, an alligator bag, 6 purses, and 2 pairs of boots
title: Homo domesticus
